issues.description: The template’s PersonController class is missing the WebClient and internal persons list fields, as well as the constructor that initializes them. The problem statement and UML explicitly call for a single WebClient instance and an internal list of Person objects, and the solution implements these fields and a constructor. Without them, students cannot compile or follow the intended design.
issues.suggested_fix: In PersonController.java, add private fields ‘WebClient webClient’ and ‘List<Person> persons’, then implement a public constructor that initializes webClient (with base URL and default JSON headers) and persons = new ArrayList<>(), mirroring NoteController’s setup.
